Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to requirements for certain contracts for materials, supplies, or services
Summary: Relates to requirements for certain contracts for materials, supplies, or services under $50,000; assures the prudent and economical use of public moneys in the best interests of the taxpayers; requires an authority in the city of New York to develop a procurement corruption prevention training program; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง151-b, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to requirements for certain contracts for materials, supplies, or services
